thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Megan Vitko

author: Megan Vitko
title: Megan Vitko
text: I booked a last minute flight for my mom to join me on a work conference. I must have forgot to check the am/pm carefully and booked her to land 12+ hours after me. I called the flightnetwork.com customer service number and they helped me book a new flight and refunded me my original flight. I am beyond grateful and couldn't be happier! Thank you so much for the wonderful service! This was my first experience with the website.
